DescriptionData.Title: Ruby Red Face Paint - Light Grey (18 ml)
DescriptionData.Description: Ruby Red Light Grey face paints are semi-solid cake face paints with strong pigmentation. They are water activated, apply fast and dry within 20 to 30 seconds. Ruby Red is made in USA and is FDA approved for USA, Canada, EU & Mexico. Ruby Red also comes with a child toy safety rating.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Water activated, semi-solid cake makeup with strong pigmentation
Hypo-allergenic, non-toxic and vegan (free of any animal related product)
Free of paraben, fragrance, latex, nuts & gluten
0.61 oz/18 ml is enough to paint 100 full faces or approx. 1,000 cheek art designs (2" x 2" size).
FDA approved and made in USA
